pr_title: Also try .exe for cred helpers on Windows

timeline.message: Also try .exe for cred helpers on Windows

timeline.bodyText: Do we have a citation for this? Just curious would be helpful to include.
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: Added this link to the code comment.
replies.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText:
I think this comment doesn't fully comply with the line 112.
// We are on windows with undefined/ambiguous file extension ?
timeline.author: loosebazooka

timeline.bodyText: Ccan we not detect this earlier? Or are we relying on path information that we may not have?
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: Yeah, we want to test if the OS can find the command through $PATH. And most of the time, it isn't a full path in practice.
replies.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Oh, that reminded me that we check the file existence if it is a path. There's another place I need to fix.
replies.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Done with the latest commit a409b84.
replies.author: chanseokoh
